k_value.docs:
**, int**: The K value comes from the datasheet. It will default to 4096 if not specified, which is appropriate for a sensor with a range of +/- 0.5kPa.

*See also: [CFSensor XGZP68xx Series Differential Pressure Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/xgzp68xx.html#configuration-variables)*
